product_name: Salomon Sense Hydro S-Lab Handheld Hydration Set
long_description: Holding a water bottle while you run is no fun. That's why Salomon created the Sense Hydro S-Lab handheld hydration set that keeps your hands relaxed while you're logging the miles. Similar to wrist warmers, the Hydro S-Lab slips over your hand; includes 2 gloves that each have a thin elastic strap for securing a soft flask in your palm for easy access. A thin elastic cord loop keeps the mouth of the flask properly oriented so drinking is as simple as raising your hand to your mouth and taking a sip. Includes 1 PVC-free and BPA-free 8 fl. oz. soft flask that conforms to your hand; Salomon Sense Hydro S-Lab set can accommodate 5 fl. oz. Salomon soft flasks (not included). Bite down on the valve and give the flask a slight squeeze to squirt water into your mouth. Wipe sweat off your brow with the soft terry cloth fabric on back. Breathable mesh palms keep your hands cool. Set includes 2 gloves and 1 soft flask; additional flasks sold separately. Salomon Sense Hydro S-Lab set is machine washable.
